featured.text: It is also the subject of many international agreements that aim to govern and facilitate international trade, such as those negotiated through the World Trade Organization (WTO).
But baby elephants, not used to negotiating rough ground, may easily fall into the trenches and get hurt; and once injured, they might not be able to climb out.

definition.en_def: To discuss something in order to reach an agreement.
definition.example: The two companies will negotiate the terms of the contract next week.
